body: As the bladebound magus increases in level, so do the Wisdom and Charisma of the black blade. These abilities start at 6 and increase by 1 for every two levels of magus.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Magus/Magus Archetypes/Bladebound/Black Blades/Black Blade Basics/Wisdom and Charisma
name: Wisdom and Charisma
